root.name: Peter Pepper's Ice Cream Factory
root.description: OverviewPeter Pepper's Ice Cream Factory is an action game developed and published by Data East for the Arcade platform.Peter Pepper's Ice Cream Factory is the sequel to Burgertime.GameplayPeter Pepper's Ice Cream Factory plays somewhat similar to Burgertime, but rather than trying to build hamburgers at the bottom of the screen, the goal is to reunite scoops of ice cream with their cones.Unlike Burgertime, in Peter Pepper's Ice Cream Factory the player does not walk on top of the ice cream, but rather needs to kick it and try to land it on top of an empty ice cream cone.Peter Pepper does not have any sort of attack in Ice Cream Factory, but instead can jump and the ice cream scoops that are kicked can take out the enemies.
